charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - METHAMPHETAMINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: ORDERED: dft shall be imprisoned for 141 months; court recommends that the BOP place dft at El Reno, OK and strongly recommends that dft NOT be designated to a facility in CO and recommends dft particpate in a residential Drug Abuse Program; upon rel ease dft placed on supervised release for five (5) years; special conditions; dft pay $100 to CVF immediately; no fine imposed; costs of imprisonment and supervised release are waived; dft advised of right to appeal within 10 days; copy of PSI w ill be forwarded to USBP; dft remanded;
